values:
Ok i know i havent written in awhile, and i have quite a bit to say so i'm going to try and make this as quick and sweet as possible...


New York...
was great...and also a tearful event...
I didnt even get to GO to the city.
My aunt's back went out and she was blowing 
chunks practiclly the whole time.
I did get to shop.I did get kick ass clothes.
Which i love.Which i cant wait to wear.
And i DID hook up with a very cute 16 year old boy 
who was sadly a bad kisser and ended up a dissapointment...
But i wanted an adventure and i got one.
I met alot of amazing people...
I have a crazy aunt over there who grows pinapples ,yes, pinapples,
in her own back yard.Great huh?

Marching band started 2 days after i got back and has been an utter blast!
Today will be Moxie day when the upper classmen come and join us!YAY.
I've been marching my ass off...
and that's what hurts the most too.My ass.I find it hard to play,
do horn swings, and watch my stepping all at once though.
It's a challenge.But it's fun.

I went to my family reunion and hung out with my cousins...
I didnt ahe the best tmie in the world...we walked on the bay and caught crabs (which we later found out was illegal) and swam in the pool.

I got some money today from babysitting the spawn of satan.
100 bucks is good enough for a few weeks of bordem.
I'm taking it to NY right after i buy cell minutes...
yes dahlings, i am out AGAIN.It's awful... as soon as i get them i seem to waste them so fast and poof! i have my aunt and uncle calling my cell and i get in trouble for not having minutes...AGAIN.i dont think i'll be telling anyone i have them though.Because i know if i do i'll use them.and wont have them when needed the most.The rest of my cash is strictly NY money.If i buy any more i'll be in HUGE trouble.They proabably wont even like me buying cell minutes.Oh well.Dont ask dont tell right??

Mike called my house today...
from Texas...
talk about a damper.
It was ok though...i told him i had "things to do" and i hung up.
I feel good though...forgetting about him and moving on...
to Chad.With the cute laugh.Chad with the beautiful smile.
Chad with the amazing eyes.Chad who i will be seeing this weekend.
Fabulous Chad.Who knows what will happen right?I'm a freshman in highschool...
and this summer has already been full of chanegs...
I'm so happy to think about them.

Last night my purchases were...

A pair of Square purple-ish sunglasses.
An adorable notbook with designs with old fashion wall paper print.
A new bag 
And a pair of lol YES WATER SOCKES for the river...i'm tierd of breaking flip-flops and hurting my feet on the rocks....what else can i do??I feel like a fish at that river...
i like to swim in it...
but never in a pool...
lets say that the YMCA...
with STRANGERS.YUCK.and embarassing.

I, jamie broten am leaving to new york on august second!*gasp*
I've always wanted to go! now is the time!I've never even been on a PLANE let alone the east coast...wish me well!!!!


Last weekend out at wynoochee i had 3 teenage boys knocking on my tent in the middle of the night trying to get me and my friend to leave with them...let's say NOT GOING TO HAPPEN.
it ended with one of them driving by at 3 in the morning and throwing a waterbottle at my uncle....fabulous right?HAHA.


I've actually been talking to my cousin jake who is going to be a sophmore and we are totally opposites on the social ladder....it's odd and new...but he's cooler then i expected.
Actually becomming a good FRIEND.*gasp* that hasn;t happend seince we were like 5.

New boy with a shy smile has been looking my way...all i know is he helps his mom with her scoliosis(sp?) and his little baby cousin that moved in with him...and he helps in the kitchen out at wynoochee and is 15...has a permit...and already owns a car.His name is Chad.At least i'm liking someone in my age group this time.GOOD FOR ME.

                            Traveling,Refusingly,Friendly,Eye catching-ly yours,
                                            jamie love

So interesting things have been happening...


 I now know a cross-dresser.
Who wants me to go shopping with him.
No one else knows he's a cross dresser.
I would have never known other-wise.
I thought the furthest this man got was wearing woman's
panties.I guess I was wrong.I thought it was neato at first.
Knowing a cross dresser.But things change...
I'm trying to be supportive, but all he now talks about 
is himself.Asking questions like...
How should I know what size of bra to get?
Where can I get fishnet stockings?
Where can I get leggings?
Would this go with my skirt?
Do they sell water bra's at Wal-Mart?

What do you say to a cross dresser that wont leave you alone?
Honestly, i'm happy to help...but knowing that THIS particular person
is a cross dresser....is akward.I guess I should feel blessed that 
he actually found me trust worthy enough to tell.


In other news...
 Mike left to TEXAS.teehee! no more having to bother with him.
No more having to turn my phone off....
No more dealing with my anger...
No more pressure.
YAY! I'm one VERY happy girl.

I found out the dot on top of an i is called a "tittle"....
How cute is that???

I'm nearly finished with Rebel Angels...Good book.Better than 
a Great & Terrible Beauty...and very shocking to go along with.

The book signing for Twilight is on the 20th!!!! I REALLY want to go...
I have to go buy the book.And of course money for a t-shirt while i'm there...
I feel like i'll be meeting Ann Rice or something...Vampire queen...
Although no one can measure up to Ann.

Today I have SOMETHING to do!!!!! It's not the GREATEST thing in the world,
But i'm going to Ocean Shores and i'm going to a family friends house
for one of the kids b-day.Get this.They have 7, YES, 7 CHILDREN.
2 of them are teens around my age.The others younger.But I have something
to do right???
   I recently discoverd it is my aunts dog, Serria's, birthday!
She is a taco bell dog, looks exacly like it but smaller, with bigger ears,
and deifinatly more "yippy".I shall scratch her tummy and give her a treat.
Surviving 1 year as a small aniamal in this house is an amazing task.

My week has been more than boring.
Which is depressing.
I'm tierd.Babysitting.
Stayed up late last night reading 
Vampire Kisses.Good book.
I need to find the sequal Kissing Coffins.
Everything had been uber crazy.
My aunt is always mad.We got into this
huge fight.Yelling, Screamin, ended in Tears.
Wynoochee, was just hot mad miserable.I got sunburnt.
Went swimming in the river.And the pool.Inwhich,
Tony (creepy guy with toe fettish) kept on staring.
Which made me and Belinda uncomfortable, 
so we left.All i've been doing seince i got home was
babysit, and recive annoying phone calls from Michael.

I have over-active stomach acid.SOOOOO I was in uber pain last night after eating at Alec's by the Sea.I thought i was going to blow chunks all night.Not to mention the fact I got sun burnt....on my back...so it was painful to sleep that way also.My aunt is going to put me on new meds.ARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGH.My legs hurt from walking all weekend and idk why, but sometimes complaining about these things helps.So I have done my duty.


                            Achingly,Paining-ly yours,
                                                      jamie love

So far...summer has been boring.I havent had much to do.I can make a nice short list of ALL the things I have done.Which includes watching t.v....which I dont do much.

1.Babysit
2.Go to the library.
3.Go to youth group
4.Watch Will&Grace
5.Read Rebel Angles and Diary of a Teenage girl.
6.MSN,LJ,Myspace
...................
I'm lucky it's only the second day of summer.
I need to spice things up.Isn't summer supposed to be fun?
I should be hangging out with friends,going to movies,being a crazy teenage girl...
But insted, i'm watching the 10 year old spawn of satan who's cover up name is "Matt"...
I'm sure he was 666 tattoed on his head...that's the reason he freaks out when someone says 
we should shave his head...I just know it...

1.Rebel Angels
2.Charmed Thirds (need to finish)
3.Sixteen
4.Rainbow Boys Series
5.Perks Of Being a Wall Flower
6.Please Kill Me
7.Ostrich Eye
8.Just Listen


........................................


That's all I can think of for the moment.

Graduated from Miller today.Didn't cry.Didn't care.My mom showed up.High off of heroin.Again.My past is seems to be dying.My old Grade School, A.Young closed today.I cane in to say hi to some old teachers.Who cried...Sadness.I was disturbed while visiting though by my phone going off....From who else?Mike.I answerd like an idiot and told him I was busy.
That I would call him later.Which I haven't.We are on 3 call backs now.The damn phone is going off...ring....ring....ring....ring....ring....ACK!It's annoying.He can't seem to get a damn clue.He will never have me back.I will never take him back.And I don't need his bullshit.
 A.H.S is on the way....I don't even know how to react.Just listening to Time Of Your Life by Greenday.And I do hope that this year for growing has given you the time of your life.I know it has for me.

                                   Moving on-ing-ly,None Reacting-ly,Time of your lifeing-ly
                                                           yours,
                                                                 jamie love.

.The end of my miller experience has finally come.one word, WoW.
It has gone by so fast.Making friends and loosing them.Finding those who i can look up to, and realizing those who i cant.It went by ever so fast.Just to think 4 years ago i moved into this house with my aunt and uncle .....in another 4 years all i would have wanted will come true.The end of high school.I'm writing this before highschool has even began.My life is taking motion, it truly is.

   .I'm going to be an aunt of a baby girl this October.Hali May MacMillan.I just hope i can be the cool aunt who will teach it things about fashion and movies,music,etc.And that this child wont grow up to be a snob like it's mother.The Abercromibie, Aropostale, Cheer-leading, Complaining, snobby mother. Let's hope "the apple doesnt fall far from the tree" really wont apply here.

  .Sonya, great friend, has been acting very distant and grumpy after her fight with her boyfriend at his church and comming out to me about being Bisexual.I didn't act like it was a big deal....i mean i love Sonya to death how did she want me to act?And the fight wither her bf?Trying to be supportive but she just get's mad....what do you do?
 

 .Is it bad to talk about past love?Because Mike has been bothering me....I just dont want to be bothered with the bullshit of his idiotic choices.Or me for not seeing the flaws at first.Love makes us blind.But who's to say it shouldn't? if we saw all of our lovers flaws there wouldnt be a thing called "love".We cant see all the flaws.We are only human.But by the time you do see them, they dont matter anymore do they?That person has your heart and there's nothing you can do.

                         High-schooling-ly,Auntily, Friendlily, Blind-lovingly,yours-
                                                      Jamie love...

....Ok so here i am...looking out into the past, laying here looking into all of my skies and i cant remember...who was i 5 months ago?i seemed to have changed so much...it's incredible.New friends, New intrests, i feel more mature, i've been finding who i really am.I look at myself , or pictures of myself in my room and i think 


.wow...how naive i was...
.Omigod! what was i wearing!!
.or the third...who WAS I?
       

            I just cant seem to get over the fact that i feel more comfortable with myself now then i did then.How i just gave up on trying to impress others and just became myself with no cares about what anyone thought.Yes, of course i had my inspirations, and people who helped me along the way.Also reading certain books, listening to certain music, and watching certain movies....i cant say it didn't help make who i am today.My fashion, yes, i believe still sucks some days.I'll be in a rush and wear something completely unorigional that makes me feel gross.Literally.I get horrified when i see someone else wear the same shirt as me.It happend today and i buttoned up my jacket and dogged people all day.It was awful on my part.never wearing that shirt again unless i'm in the house alone or like 5 years from now when i'm sure no one will be wearing it.I still have silly run-in's like that and i get embarassed but i think i've really grown as a person in the past year.with all of my troubles, and craziness.But it helped me learn and it's silly to think back on how i was then.But at least i'm a little more sure of myself, and more comfortable.yay!

   
                                         me myself and i-ly yours-
                                                                   Jamie

I'm home sickly today....i didnt want to be at school.So....this may sound stupid..i made myself puke in order to get home.I dont like being held captive in a hell hole with the cover name "miller" and i couldnt handle it today.....
  Mike and i broke it off last month andno he 'regrets it' and 'wants me back' and all of this complete bullshit i cannot SAND.Does he honestly think i'm ignorrant enough to give him a second chance.He, the man who was trying to get back with his ex, yes, WHILE WITH ME.....he's an ass....he now see's his mistakes but he obviously doesnt see that i'm not a freaking idiot.In the words of Dirk from Weeztie Bat.'Love is a Dangerous Angel'. 

  I'm confiding in music today, as i do everyday.Today my choice of Music is Damone.In a previous comment i was told to listen to them...so i am...and they rock.This woman's strong punk voice and the feel of the guitar all spak for it's self.It seems to relate with the hurt in me today.Lately my music choice has mostly revolved around the Dresden Dolls."Dirty Buisness" speaks for it's self.
   My room needs to be cleaned.I need to return a few book and movies.Do homework.Sleep.Eat something.Do dishes.Get money for cell minutes.Buy a few books& cd's.and last....keep my eye's off of a few spacific male forms......and my last thought for this entry...Tv is a black hole.

Isn't it funny how we are in different parts of our life's all the time? You can be at the top, or the bottom.And things that seemed to matter so long ago dont matter as much?People change, grow, learn different things and have different points of veiw after you may have been so close for awhile.I admit it does hurt to grow apart.But never the less spacific people have always, will always be a huge part in my life.And i would never want them to have any pain.I still care.

  It was my birthday on Easter.I am now 14....not thatbig of a change...but hey, at least it's a step.I got my hair done and some wonderful books.Gift cards.and money too.I had to spend it with family,who as a matter affact i can NEVER seem to get along with.even the slightest.*sigh* oh well.

*Yawn*
I'm tierd.
I went to my 
cousin's last 
night.
I poured my
heart out.
It feels good to 
talk to someone.
Who listens.
Who offers 
sympathy and 
advice.
I love that.
Mike is the only
other soul who knows
my secrets.
It's nice to have an
equal male who loves you.

I am tierd.bored.with nothing to do.The rain hasn't come,i don;t think i'll be able to sleep until it does.It's hard.Fashion wont leave my mind.And boys are so silly! Skyler thinks i hate him now.Can you belive that?I never said i hated him.I admit i didn't want him to think i liked him anymore.But it wasn;t like i was rude to him.People call us band geeks, really i was talking about this with Chelsea and she made a clever idea of course were not band geeks! were band chic! I myself found this veary amsusing and interesting.I found myself upset, Liz my best friend might move. Not for awhile, but still. None honestly knows me like Liz. Were so close, and she knows practiclly everything about me. We can almost read eachothers minds.I joined Drama Club.I want to be in flim when i'm older so i decided this would be a smart choice. Mrs.Good wantes me to write out some outlines of a modernized fairytale.I'm thinking Sleeping beauty... It might be an interesting choice.I can do alot with Sleeping beauty.(no not what your thinking!!)I also need to write a paper to get into the AP English Class next year.In band we have a group and have to preform for the class which to me is like ,...Ack! I CAN'T DO THAT!!!I get quite nervous in front of people....i can play my music...i just can't do it in fromt of my peers.

Nervously yours,
                Jamie

                 p.s i'm reading this book and it's basiclly this girls diary that's how she would always sign out of e-mails to her best friend.I think i might use it now, let's see if it will stick!

Hello dahlings,
               No i won;t say anything more about skyler,it's just something to talk about.
I have been reading enough books to drive myself literally insane. Wuthering heights, Twilight, Sloppy first. ect. I'm going insane living in this green alian planet of aberdeen.And i can say i'm insane a million times on here. No i'm not going to try to.I'm so very happy about the fact that this semester is now OVER . Thank god.I've been working on my screen play which if i may say so myself is going quite well.I'm semi worried about myself. I havent been able to eat or sleep that well for awile now. Can't be healty.Well i better be going.
                               Ciao dahlings,
                                             jamie

The boy i told you about.Forget it.Sadly i dont know what to say.He and i can't talk.Now he's in california.And for some reasn were 2 afraid to talk to eachother.And I can't help but see him as a little boy.

I'm exited , happy , and fantastic! I told the boy that i liked him , i told him everything . *breaths*
And guess what? he liked me 2!he was too scared to tell me! But i finally stepped up to my worst fear and told him! And it turned out for the better!Life couldn't be better at this moment. And i'll see him tonight . Everything will be fabulaous . I'll keep you updated! ciao!

I think i'm over him now . It's gonna take awhile to take this in , it's gonna take while just to feel this . Sunlight on my skin . I was hiding in the darkness , not letting anyone in . I've been so confused over all of this . It wasn't sinking in . But now i'm comming out again . I think i'm over him now  .

Well it's that time of year again when i have nothing better to do than get stuck watching little children and only get payed for 1/2 the time .Yet i have to admit the fabulous presents and trips to kick ass places with friends make up for it . Such as Leavnworth with my ever most bestfriend Liz . A.K.A Dizzy . So figure tomorrow i'm going to go see Fun with Dick and Jane with Micheal , another one of my veary best friends . This LJ is going ok for now i guess, it get's confusing but it's alright . Lately I've been working on my screen play , Perserverance and Fabulosness . It's comming along Great so far , I'm exited , I'll keep you updated on it more later  .

                                            ~*jamie*~
